body_html:
+1,

Is it possible to implement this using current conv3d layer? The doc for it says:
"Our Conv3D implements a form of cross-correlation.", but I was not able to make it actually work for correlating 2 images.

body:
+1,

Is it possible to implement this using current `conv3d` layer? The doc for it says:
"Our Conv3D implements a form of cross-correlation.", but I was not able to make it actually work for correlating 2 images.
